thread.title: U.S. Gears Up to Challenge Beijing's 'Great Wall of Sand'

title: U.S. Gears Up to Challenge Beijing's 'Great Wall of Sand'
text:
23 U.S. Gears Up to Challenge Beijing's 'Great Wall of Sand' 
Foreign Policy: Almost 20 years ago, when China used missile tests to intimidate Taiwan ahead of key elections there, the United States responded by dispatching not one but two aircraft carrier strike groups to the area. The unabashed U.S. show of force set off howls of protest in Beijing, which deemed it a “hostile act,” yet America was able to respond with impunity to brazen Chinese behavior and act to buttress its allies in the region.
